__e: Can't believe my ancestors were such boneheads.
How do you teach your children their history, who their ancestors were, where they come from?
I mean... Ough! I mean, to our ancestors this place was sacred.
And you need to take my word for it, because of what my ancestors and the council agreed to at the charter of Wittenberg in 1682.
They prayed to their ancestors and they made offerings to protect them from evil.
I will show you my home and we will sit in the hall where my forefathers sat and drink Ale.
